channel.title: Turoth Question and Another
channel.description:
So I was wondering what is the most efficient way of killing a Turoth? I've been using the leaf-bladed spear because I don't want to use range against them as I have a set level on what I want it to be now, but if I have to, I suppose I'll use it, unless of course that isn't the most efficient way of killing them.
Also.. I've been wondering about this for a while, when someone becomes a non-member and still in a member area, what happens to their account?

item.title: Turoth Question and Another
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

70-80 range isn’t that bad, especially through slayer. You’d be surprised how powerful and cheap it is to combine a rune c’bow, broad bolts, and a focus sight. It’s quick and relatively free range experience.

Read full topic

item.title: Turoth Question and Another
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Miss Silabsoft:

I use the leaf bladed sword and watch TV because the task takes forever.

Yeah, tell me about it… that damn thing took me two days because it was annoying the fuck out of me.

Taharok:

I find the bolts to be a good approach. They are as powerful as addy bolts, so they aren’t that slow to use. Plus it’s one of those rare tasks that almost work better with range, so no harm done in a little extra range exp.

Well… I have OCD and I recently got 70 Range, there is no way I’m going over 70 because that’ll drive me crazy and I don’t want to train the damn thing.

Read full topic

item.title: Turoth Question and Another
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Classic_:

Spear and rune/drag defender

You can wield the spear and defender together.

Read full topic

item.description:
@classic wrote:

Spear and rune/drag defender

item.title: Turoth Question and Another
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Alright, thanks for the information. I suppose whenever I get a chance, I’ll do the task now. I’ve been using that damn spear which hasn’t been helping my case too much.

Read full topic

item.title: Turoth Question and Another
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:4, topic:432897”]melee : leaf bladed sword with dragon defender, full str bonus gear or prayer gear for piety.

range: I may be wrong but you can use like broad arrows/bolts I think…[/quote]

You are correct

I would use a lead bladed sword for efficiency if i were you though

Read full topic

range: I may be wrong but you can use like broad arrows/bolts I think…

item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Just use a leaf-bladed sword with a dragon defender.
